Mahamane Cissé (a mụrụ Disemba 27, 1993 na Ansongo, Mali) bụ onye egwuregwu bọọlụ Niger nke na-agba FC Nouadhibou na otu egwuregwu bọọlụ mba Niger.
A mụrụ Cissé na Mali site na nna Mali na nne Niger. Ọ nọchitere anya obodo amụrụ ya na 2013 African U-20 Championship na Algeria

Otú ọ dị, mgbe e mesịrị n'afọ ahụ, ọ họọrọ ịnọchite anya Niger na mba ụwa wee mee mpụta mbụ ya maka Ménas na September 7 na 2014 FIFA World Cup qualifier megide Congo, na-ebute ihe mgbaru ọsọ na 2-2 eserese. Mgbe egwuregwu ahụ gasịrị, Congo gbara akwụkwọ mkpesa na FIFA gbasara ntozu Cissé ịgba egwu Niger. Agbanyeghị, FIFA kwadoro na ọ nabatara arịrịọ maka mgbanwe otu onye ọkpụkpọ ahụ, na-eme ka ọ nwee ike ịnọchite anya Niger na mba ụwa ma jụ arịrịọ Congo
Akara na rịzọlt depụtara na mbụ ọnụọgụ goolu Niger.
